I usually wear a 3x but ordered the 5x. It fits perfectly. I am 8 months pregnant and the stretch is perfect. Because of how beautiful, soft and luxurious this is, when I wear it I feel on-top-of-the-world happy. Can't wait to use this for a renaissance festival too.

1st, Im a size 10/12, and I have learned to ignore Amazons size recommendations as the AI doesent get you want different sizes, this is not true to size, its loose all over, which is what I wanted so I can sinch and wear a corsette, however the neckline is not sweetheart but a high unflattering boat neck, the material feels awful like polyester, and it smells. The photo gives the impression of princess seaming, nope its cut like a box. Overall its a shapeless mess, that should have cost $15, not over $50. Also there is this odd string tie thing,that I just dont get. Im debating do I pull out the sewing machine and fix this , or return it. Its winter and I dont really feel like driving to UPS, but as I am writing this review, I will suck it up and return. For this amount of money I should not need to rip it apart and re sew it into something else

评论概述: Worse than a Hot Topic or Halloween Costume
评论详情: I was fairly sure for the price this was going to be a cheap top, and I wasn't wrong. As for sizing, I have to say that first of all it is smaller than standard, so order at least one size bigger (I would recommend 2). When you do get it, I hope you are comfortable that it is a thin, Halloween costume feeling that is not flattering unless you airbrush your pictures of yourself.  For $20 it would be worth using it as a last minute costume, but for $60 this is nothing. If you want a corset you will need to spend at least twice this much and go to a real corset shop.

I believe I now own one of each "Dare2Wear" dresses and apparel ....and each of them attract bevies of positive comments, and WOW are they sexy!  I bought a large for each dress, and I'm 5 foot 7 inches, 127.4lbs with a 30 inch waist.  They fit "true to form" are DEFINITELY SEXY!

评论概述: Great Quality Perfect Flattering Fit So Worth The Money
评论详情: According to the seller size chart found in the product description, I would wear a size 3X . But, I had serious doubts this would work out and I really hate the "sausage" appearance, preferring a flattering, loose, comfortable fit (I'm 63). Since this costume was for my 4th wedding anniversary on Halloween , I ordered over 2 months early and figured if it was wrong, I would have plenty of time to exchange before the best styles were picked over. Well, the 5X is exactly the fit I expected. It came laced up and I just slipped it over my head as-is. and voila, it looks and fits great. That said, anyone looking for a tight fitting, snug garment, would actually have ordered the 3X.
Love the design, and material

I have always loved the Gothic/Victorian style but could never find any stores around me that will actually have something beautiful like this or if they did, not for people of my size -_-. The shirt and style is just so super flattering and gorgeous. So glad it fits as expected. Pay attention to her size chart. You get what you pay for so it is honestly worth the money. Feels nice and heavy (I mean luxury feeling) beautiful detailing, soft. Not falling apart, actually looks like a professional made these. I have about 5 or 6 of dare to wear shirts now and I am completely convinced that I am now a loyal customer. However this is only first impressions.  I will edit this post as I wear them and wash them just to update how they hold up.  Update 4/19/2021: I have had these shirts for quite a while now never had any issues with any of the lace messing up or anything I am very pleased with these. Keep in mind I don’t wear them all the time only for nice occasions or if I just feel like looking super cute when I go out and about with family or friends.
